LegoR 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Get all lego sets in a category

lego_get_sets.Rd

Get all lego sets in a category

lego_get_sets(url)

Arguments

url

url of the base page (additional pages will be retrieved automatically)

Examples

library(LegoR)
lego_get_sets("https://shop.lego.com/en-US/category/creator-3-in-1")
#> # A tibble: 25 x 5
